description: ICS techniques used by BlackEnergy, ATT&CK software S0089 (v1.4)
name: BlackEnergy (S0089)

techniques.comment: [BlackEnergy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0089) targeted energy sector organizations in a wide reaching email spearphishing campaign. Adversaries utilized malicious Microsoft Word documents attachments. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)
[BlackEnergy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0089) uses HTTP POST request to contact external command and control servers. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)

[BlackEnergy](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0089) utilizes valid user and administrator credentials, in addition to creating new administrator accounts to maintain presence. (Citation: Booz Allen Hamilton)
